questions.text: What did Carol call CJ's files of Press Secretary candidates?
questions.explanation:
In-case-I-get-hit-by-a-bus file.

	Carol handed Josh the files and she told them the name that CJ gave the files. Josh gave Donna the job of helping Toby find a new Press Secretary

questions.text: Can you finish this quote made by Toby? "In the event that they can't find their way, the President can always send CJ into Romalia to swat at suicide bombers with her ______."
questions.explanation:
Purse.

	Toby was doing his first press briefing as press secretary and he made a comment that no one was ready to go to war, but if the soldiers couldn't find their way the President could send CJ in with her purse.

questions.text: Who said this? "On behalf of the Vice President, myself, and every man who has ever had a Wonder Woman fantasy. It's a bright day."
questions.explanation:
Will.

	Will said it while in CJ's office after the senior staff meeting.

questions.text: What did Roman Mindeli from the Republic of Georgia offer CJ?
questions.explanation:
Uranium.

	CJ thought Josh had set her up, but when she realized it was the real deal she called Nancy. Mr. Mindeli had been to several embassies wanting to unload the uranium on them.

questions.text: What time of the morning was it when the staff sergeants showed up at CJ's door?
questions.explanation:
5:26.

	CJ answered the door and told them it was around 5:30. Staff Sergeant Kelsy corrected her by saying he had 5:26 on his watch. Once they were all in the room, they began briefing her on ways to exit the building in case of an attack and her secret service detail showed up right after the staff sergeants.

questions.text: CJ asked Margaret to stay as her assistant.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Margaret was going to leave to go work with Leo, but CJ asked her to stay to help her and if Leo needed her then she could go.

questions.text: During the senior staff meeting, who was the last person to "quit"?
questions.explanation:
President.

	Toby was the first to offer his letter of resignation, Josh handed his in second, lastly, the President came in to tell CJ that he didn't feel comfortable working for a woman so he was going to hand the job over to the Vice President. Toby started laughing after that and CJ knew it was a joke.

questions.text: What did CJ tell the President to read instead of the energy quarterly?
questions.explanation:
Benjamin Franklin's biography.

	CJ took the President's energy quarterly away from him even though he told her to get her own copy. She wanted it because it wasn't complete because they hadn't gone over all the options yet. When CJ left, the President told Debbie had had just been spanked.

questions.text: Who became the new press secretary?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Annabeth Schott told Toby he had "watchable quality" and that she would help make him a good Press Secretary. Annabeth took Tim Waters job as Deputy Press Secretary.

Jimmy Smits.

	Jimmy Smits joins the show as Senator Matthew Santos from Texas. He was the former Mayor of Houston. Josh went to see him to persuade him to stay in Congress.
